original_text:
For wicked and deceitful mouths are opened against me,
    speaking against me with lying tongues.
korean_text: 그들이 악한 입과 거짓된 입을 열어 나를 치며 속이는 혀로 내게 말하며

sentences.original_text: For wicked and deceitful mouths are opened against me
sentences.korean_translation: 악하고 거짓된 입이 나를 향해 열렸습니다

sentences.original_text: speaking against me with lying tongues.
